verses.name: Jeremiah 32:4
verses.text: And Zedekiah king of Judah shall not escape out of the hand of the Chaldeans, but shall surely be delivered into the hand of the king of Babylon, and shall speak with him mouth to mouth, and his eyes shall behold his eyes;

verses.name: Jeremiah 32:5
verses.text: And he shall lead Zedekiah to Babylon, and there shall he be until I visit him, saith the Lord: though ye fight with the Chaldeans, ye shall not prosper.

verses.name: Jeremiah 32:6
verses.text: And Jeremiah said, The word of the Lord came unto me, saying,
